Text.val: 12.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (FCMT)
08.01.2009 GB SCR14289 extend the range to select FCI_SELLER
@Program use variables for text output to avoid translations of text controls
-- MSG10 Adjustment or Cancellation of Invoice & Credit Note
-- Also if no FCMT_MESSAGE_TEXT exist, at least one row is written
to XML with "Message text" on the left side

ExpSyntax.val: 'MSG10 Adjustment or Cancellation of Invoice & Credit Note'

Text.val: ... first line with "Message text" on left side
(also if no FCMT_MESSAGE_TEXT exist, at least one row is written
to XML with "Message text" on the left side)
